title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 October 2016 - XWiki
content:
<edvorg> has quit  
03:15 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:17 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki

03:34 <meatcar> has joined #xwiki

08:54 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki

09:11 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:56 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:27 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:27 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <daemoen\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <chaas\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:50 <webczat> has joined #xwiki  
10:51 <webczat> Hello, how would I go about implementing user expoer from xwiki to ldap if passwords are hashed?  
10:51 <webczat> \*export  
10:54 <evalica> has quit  
10:54 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:54 <daemoen> has quit  
10:54 <chaas> has quit  
11:02 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
12:02 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
12:25 <vmassol> cleaning  
12:25 <vmassol> ...  
12:27 <webczat> evalica1: curiosity, where are you from?  
12:27 <evalica1> is now known as <evalica>  
12:27 <evalica> webczat: why? :) where are you from?  
12:28 <vmassol> I'm from France if you want to know :)  
12:28 <evalica> I don't see the relevance :P  
12:54 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has joined #xwiki  
12:56 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> Hey guys, i need a bit of help with my xwiki navigation. If i click on an item in the navigation, the childs will show correct, but the clicked parent label will change to "document tree"..  
12:57 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> some ideas?  
13:04 <Enygma`> has quit  
13:05 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
13:09 <webczat> evalica: for some weird reason I wonder about that every time I see your full name. I am from Poland  
13:20 <evalica> webczat: I am from Romania. :) does my name mean something in your country?  
13:21 <webczat> it just looked (partially) slavic like to me  
13:24 <evalica> :)  
13:25 <webczat> but I was probably thinking today that you could be romanian :D  
13:35 <vmassol> nie mowie po polsku, jestem francuzem :)  
13:36 <vmassol> webczat: I've lived almost one year in Poland, in Poznan (was quite a while ago though)....  
13:36 <webczat> I will ask this again because maybe someone went in and has an idea: how could I go about implementing ldap provisioning? that is, accounts should be exported to ldap when they are created, and modified, or deleted. for central authentication as not everything does openid-connect.  
13:36 <webczat> vmassol: well! :D I live in Krakow  
13:37 <vmassol> nice, been there  
13:37 <webczat> vmassol: was it translated or you knew how to say it? it was gramatically correct :D  
13:37 <vmassol> I knew how to say it  
13:38 <vmassol> I learnt a bit polish  
13:38 <vmassol> but mostly speaking  
13:38 <vmassol> (not writing)  
13:38 <webczat> this language is difficult :P can I be proud of myself being Polish?  
13:38 <vmassol> yep very difficult with all the tense!  
13:38 <vmassol> \*tenses  
13:39 <vmassol> even worse than latin! :)  
13:39 <webczat> tenses are not difficult, other things are, conjugation or whatever  
13:39 <vmassol> like instrumental case, etc  
13:40 <webczat> I do not know english terms for cases, no  
13:41 <vmassol> anyway I really like the country (travelled a lot - I had my car there — Polish are crazy on the road, 3 cars side to side on 2 lanes road when overtaking!)  
13:41 <webczat> :D  
13:43 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> nobody here who could help me?  
13:44 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_7: hi  
13:44 <vmassol> this is a known bug that has been fixed already  
13:44 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> hi, realy? Our serveradmin installed xwiki 2 weeks ago  
13:45 <vmassol> trying to find the jira issue for you  
13:45 <webczat> about the provisioning the problem is that although I can listen to document management events, passwords are hashed. I can never get a plaintext password to save to ldap.  
13:46 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_7: what version of XWiki are you using?  
13:47 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> i am trying to find the version right now, but where?  
13:47 <vmassol> footer  
13:47 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> XWiki Enterprise 8.3-milestone-2  
13:50 <vmassol> I wonder if it's not http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13740  
13:50 <vmassol> \*mind  
13:51 <vmassol> what you could do is download the latest 8.3 snapshot and verify it works there  
13:51 <vmassol> there was http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13651 too but it was fixed in 8.3M1 and you have M2  
13:51 <vmassol> hmm  
13:52 <vmassol> maybe it's still a problem that is not fixed  
13:52 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> looks like not get fixed...  
13:52 <vmassol> what I remember is that I had it  
13:52 <vmassol> and Marius looked at it and fixed something  
13:52 <vmassol> and couldn't reproduce after that  
13:52 <vmassol> maybe it's still hapenning in some rare cases, I don't know  
13:54 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> its a new installation, i just wrote a few pages...  
13:54 <vmassol> I guess you could  raise a new jira issue and explain how to reproduce  
13:54 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> i renamed the home page...  
13:54 <vmassol> tryinh  
13:54 <vmassol> \*trying  
13:55 <vmassol> and then?  
13:55 <vmassol> BTW renaming the home page is failing for me :(  
13:56 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> i started to build our wiki, renamed the home page, build some subpages and thats all. In configs i just set up 3 languages.  
13:57 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> With the languages i found a bug too, or i did some stupid this i dont know about.  
13:57 <vmassol> yes but the breadcrumb tree problem was on which page?  
13:58 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> If i am in the german pages, the sidebar shows english and fresh, but if i switch to english or frensh, i saw 2 german languages available...  
13:58 <vmassol> ok could you report the issue in jira please with the maxmimum info on how to reproduce?  
13:59 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> the bug is on all pages. Everytime i click on a parentpage, the label changes to "document tree"  
13:59 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> in navigation  
13:59 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> jira?  
14:00 <vmassol> see http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Contributing#HReportanissue  
14:00 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> thx  
14:24 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> i wrote 2 bug reports now...  
14:30 <vmassol> thanks  
14:32 <evalica> has quit  
14:32 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
14:37 <evalica1> is now known as <evalica>  
14:38 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has quit  
14:55 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:11 <msmeria> has quit  
15:14 <evalica> RM: Starting 8.3 Release  
15:41 <webczat> you've just released 8.3?  
15:41 <vmassol> in progress  
16:43 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:43 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <acotiuga> has quit  
18:02 <vmassol> evalica: be careful about the last commit  
18:02 <vmassol> (there are problems with it)  
18:03 <evalica> yes yes...  
18:03 <evalica> the problem is that I cannot revert  
18:03 <evalica> :) trying ...  
18:03 <evalica> some problems with my git  
18:03 <evalica> at least I finished the release … trying to fix  
18:03 <evalica> Edy is trying to help me  
18:08 <tmortagne> you might need to remove the id line, commit and then put it back because from proper git client point of view "$Id: d93b6a022c8471f521a2af7893c92d3f0e9ef48f $" and "$Id$" is the same thing  
18:08 <tmortagne> evalica:  
18:30 <evalica> tmortagne: thanks - that was the only way to make it work - commit, revert, commit again - thanks for suggestion. Still not sure what went wrong :P  
18:31 <tmortagne> evalica: what git client did you used ? commend line git ?  
18:31 <evalica> I use a combination of command line + visual git editor  
18:31 <evalica> I like the diffs better visually :P  
18:31 <tmortagne> you mean gitk ?  
18:31 <evalica> the app from GitHub  
18:32 <evalica> https://desktop.github.com/  
18:32 <tmortagne> what did the actual commit ?  
18:33 <evalica> ?  
18:33 <evalica> I don't remember …  
18:33 <evalica> I think the command line  
18:34 <tmortagne> weird, you might want to check the version of git you have but I never got this kind of issue with the official git client, I know some others clients don't handle properly this property (for example EGit used to not support it) but I would be surprised github client is not as good as the official one  
18:34 <Enygma`> there was a weird behavior since after that problematic commit, she had a local modification (resetting the IDs) https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/51934663f08d5844183bc7f0ec40d47827303eb8 which we could not get rid of. Git seemed to really want it, so we committed it like it was.  
18:38 <evalica> I have the latest version … anyway - I'm glad it's over :P  
18:43 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has joined #xwiki  
18:43 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> Hello, i need custom the result of view serach  
18:43 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> search\*  
18:44 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> (/view/Main/Search)  
18:44 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> how to do?  
18:46 <vmassol> depends  
18:47 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_7: see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Solr+Search+Application
